message: Let's start fair. I take the lion's share this round, but we can work out a better deal later if you like.
You took the lion's share last round, now it's my turn to make a strong opening offer. I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not being generous just yet.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than that. Let's split it more evenly this time.
You're looking for a more even split, but I'm not willing to give up that much control just yet. I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm still holding back.
Let's meet halfway. I'm willing to give up a bit more, but I need to see a fair split soon or we'll both end up with nothing.
